contents.contents:
why did i want this

time tracking:

- i do not enjoy clockify
- it forgets about entries older than like, a week idk.
- i want to have notes, it would be so nice to have notes on clockify and then be able to see my 'work log' for a project with all of my notes in one place on a project.


lightweight issues:

- thesis type issues were annoying to make a proper 'issue' for.


grant writing:

- tracking things like the overview (important links, etc) in one place is needed
- tracking our deliverables with all of the metadata/private links for those
- linking that somehow to our external issues for reporting time is a must.


gallantries?

- cannot think of any valid reasons there.
